overview: Vanilla fans look away now! These handsome hunks couldnt give a fuck about anything tame. Theyre never happy unless theyre enjoying the kind of action that will quite literally have your eyes popping out of their sockets; riding it roughshod like the whores they have always been. James Oakleigh, David Luca and Alex Roman are just three of the hyper-horned brutes on display; using an array of slings, collars and St. Andrews crosses to take their love of hard cock to the next brutal level. If the thought of raw, hardcore action with few (if any) limits takes you to the brink, then youre set to go stratospheric time and time again; with an hour-and-a-half of non-stop, breathless sodomy all set to leave you totally drained!
title: Without Mercy
